select sti.id, sti.code, sti.start_time, sti.end_time, sti.class_id, sti.course_id, sti.type_day, sti.create_date, cai.name as className, ci.name as courseName, ci.address, si.name as staffName, si.images as staffImages, ti.name as tieName, mi.name as majorName from schedule_template_info sti left join class_info cai on (cai.id = sti.class_id) left join course_info ci on (ci.id = sti.course_id) left join left join staff_info si on (si.id = ci.staff_id) left join tie_info ti on (ti.id = ci.tie_id) left join major_info mi on (mi.id = ci.major_id) where 1 = 1
AND cai.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{scheduleTemplateInfo.className},'%')
AND ci.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{scheduleTemplateInfo.courseName},'%')
AND mi.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{scheduleTemplateInfo.majorName},'%')
AND si.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{scheduleTemplateInfo.staffName},'%')
order by sti.create_date desc
